Preparation

IOHexperimenter is built on:

  • C++ (tested on gcc 5.4.0)
  • boost.filesystem library for logging files.

Because of this, the boost library needs to be installed to be able to use the IOHexperimenter. To install boost, please visit https://www.boost.org. Once boost is installed, you are now able to use the IOHexperimenter in the programming language of your choise.
